title: How to Make Candied Fruit and Nut Roll

steps.headline: Make sure that the dried fruit is free of particles and pieces.
steps.description: Wash if needed and dab dry using a clean cloth.

steps.headline: Mix together the dates, dried fruit and the candied pineapple and moist coconut.
Blend, grind or process this mixture together.
Chop the nuts coarsely.
steps.description: Add the chopped nuts to the processed mixture.

steps.headline: Coat the base of a flat baking dish with butter.
Spread the combined mixture across the dish.
In a saucepan, melt together the sugar, water and vinegar.

steps.headline: Pour the ball mixture over the fruit layer.

steps.headline: Roll the mixture into two rolls.

steps.headline: Take wax paper and wrap the rolls.
steps.description: Refrigerate for 3 - 5 hours. Once it slices without falling apart, it is ready.

text: Make sure that the dried fruit is free of particles and pieces. Wash if needed and dab dry using a clean cloth. Mix together the dates, dried fruit and the candied pineapple and moist coconut.  Blend, grind or process this mixture together.  Chop the nuts coarsely. Add the chopped nuts to the processed mixture. Coat the base of a flat baking dish with butter.  Spread the combined mixture across the dish.  In a saucepan, melt together the sugar, water and vinegar. Boil gently and without stirring. The mixture should form a ball-like substance. Once this occurs, take it off the heat. Pour the ball mixture over the fruit layer.  Leave this to cool. Once cool, knead the entire mixture until the fruit layer and ball mixture are combined. Roll the mixture into two rolls. These should be about 2 inches (5.1 cm). Take wax paper and wrap the rolls. Refrigerate for 3 - 5 hours. Once it slices without falling apart, it is ready. Serve as slices.
